2012.7.6 20:00 - 2012.7.7 20:00
Geological disaster meteorological forecast in shaanxi province
Shaanxi provincial department of land and resources
Shaanxi meteorological bureau
Jointly release

 From tonight to tomorrow, the geological disaster weather forecast of western han China, tongchuan, xianyang and baoji is at the level of three, and the possibility of landslide, collapse, debris flow and other geological disasters is relatively high. Please pay attention to prevention.
